languages.text: Вы можете повысить уровень персонажа и его спутников! За победу в боях, исследование мира и выполнение заданий вы получаете {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}очки опыта{/g} — когда их число достигнет определенной отметки, ваш персонаж получит новый уровень. Зажмите {console_bind|RightBottom}, выделите иконку {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}повышения уровня{/g} и отпустите {console_bind|RightBottom}, чтобы перейти к окну повышения уровня. На каждом новом уровне персонажи получают опции развития — эти опции включают выбор новых {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талантов{/g}, улучшения {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навыков{/g} или других параметров. Спутники получают новые уровни одновременно с вашим персонажем. Даже если они не присутствуют в активной группе во время странствий, вы всегда сможете повысить их уровень позже.

traits.locale_text: Вы можете повысить уровень персонажа и его спутников! За победу в боях, исследование мира и выполнение заданий вы получаете очки опыта — когда их число достигнет определенной отметки, ваш персонаж получит новый уровень. Зажмите {console_bind|RightBottom}, выделите иконку {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}Повышение уровня{/g} и отпустите {console_bind|RightBottom}, чтобы перейти к окну повышения уровня. На каждом новом уровне персонажи получают опции развития — эти опции включают выбор новых способностей, талантов, улучшения навыков или других параметров. Спутники получают новые уровни одновременно с вашим персонажем. Даже если они не присутствуют в активной группе во время странствий, вы всегда сможете повысить их уровень позже.

languages.text: You can advance the level of your character and their companions! Prevailing in battles, exploring the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, and completing quests earns you {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}experience points{/g}. Once you have accumulated enough experience, your character gains a new level. Hold {console_bind|RightBottom}, select the {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}level up{/g} icon, then release {console_bind|RightBottom} to open the level up screen. Each level gained offers your characters new progression options, which include new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} improvements, and other enhancements. Your companions gain new levels at the same time as your character. Even if they are not included in the active party during your journeys, you can always increase their level later.
languages.original_text: Вы можете повысить уровень персонажа и его спутников! За победу в боях, исследование мира и выполнение заданий вы получаете {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}очки опыта{/g} — когда их число достигнет определенной отметки, ваш персонаж получит новый уровень. Зажмите {console_bind|RightBottom}, выделите иконку {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}повышения уровня{/g} и отпустите {console_bind|RightBottom}, чтобы перейти к окну повышения уровня. На каждом новом уровне персонажи получают опции развития — эти опции включают выбор новых {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талантов{/g}, улучшения {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навыков{/g} или других параметров. Спутники получают новые уровни одновременно с вашим персонажем. Даже если они не присутствуют в активной группе во время странствий, вы всегда сможете повысить их уровень позже.

traits.locale_text: You can advance the level of your character and their companions! Prevailing in battles, exploring the world, and completing quests earns you experience points. Once you have accumulated enough experience, your character gains a new level. Hold {console_bind|RightBottom}, select the {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}Level Up{/g} icon, then release {console_bind|RightBottom} to open the level up screen. Each gained level offers your characters new progression options, which include new abilities, talents, skill improvements, and other enhancements. Your companions gain new levels at the same time as your character. Even if they are not included in the active party during your journeys, you can always increase their level later.

Your companions gain new levels at the same time as your character. Even if they are not included in the active party during your journeys, you can always increase their level later.

Your companions gain new levels at the same time as your character. Even if they are not included in the active party during your journeys, you can always increase their level later.

languages.text: ¡El nivel de tu personaje y sus compañeros se puede potenciar! Al salir con vida de batallas, explorar la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g} y completar misiones, conseguirás {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}puntos de experiencia{/g}. Cuando hayas acumulado la experiencia suficiente, tu personaje obtendrá un nivel nuevo. Mantén {console_bind|RightBottom}, selecciona el icono de {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}subida de nivel{/g} y suelta {console_bind|RightBottom} para abrir la pantalla de subida de nivel. A cada nivel que ganen, tus personajes dispondrán de nuevas opciones de progreso, como nuevas {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g}, mejoras de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidades{/g} y demás avances. Tus compañeros adquieren niveles nuevos a la par que tu personaje. Aunque no se encuentren en el grupo activo durante tus aventuras, siempre puedes aumentarles el nivel más adelante.
languages.original_text: You can advance the level of your character and their companions! Prevailing in battles, exploring the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, and completing quests earns you {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}experience points{/g}. Once you have accumulated enough experience, your character gains a new level. Hold {console_bind|RightBottom}, select the {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}level up{/g} icon, then release {console_bind|RightBottom} to open the level up screen. Each level gained offers your characters new progression options, which include new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} improvements, and other enhancements. Your companions gain new levels at the same time as your character. Even if they are not included in the active party during your journeys, you can always increase their level later.

traits.locale_text: ¡El nivel de tu personaje y sus compañeros se puede potenciar! Al salir con vida de batallas, explorar la Extensión de Koronus y completar misiones, conseguirás {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}puntos de experiencia{/g}. Cuando hayas acumulado la experiencia suficiente, tu personaje obtendrá un nivel nuevo. Mantén {console_bind|RightBottom}, selecciona el icono de {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}subida de nivel{/g} y suelta {console_bind|RightBottom} para abrir la pantalla de subida de nivel. A cada nivel que ganen, tus personajes dispondrán de nuevas opciones de progreso, como nuevas {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g}, mejoras de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidades{/g} y demás avances. Tus compañeros adquieren niveles nuevos a la par que tu personaje. Aunque no se encuentren en el grupo activo durante tus aventuras, siempre puedes aumentarles el nivel más adelante.

languages.text: 自分のキャラクターや仲間のレベルを上げることができる！戦闘に勝利し、{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}を探索し、クエストを完了すると{g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}経験値{/g}を獲得できる。経験値が十分貯まると、キャラクターは新たなレベルに到達する。{console_bind|RightBottom}を押したまま{g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}レベルアップ{/g}アイコンを選択し、{console_bind|RightBottom}を離すとレベルアップ画面が開く。 レベルが上がるごとに、新しい{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}能力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}の向上、その他の強化など、キャラクターの新しい成長オプションが手に入る。 仲間は、あなたのキャラクターと同時に新しいレベルに到達する。旅の間、仲間が活動中の部隊に加わっていない場合でも、後でいつでもレベルを上げることができる。
languages.original_text: You can advance the level of your character and their companions! Prevailing in battles, exploring the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, and completing quests earns you {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}experience points{/g}. Once you have accumulated enough experience, your character gains a new level. Hold {console_bind|RightBottom}, select the {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}level up{/g} icon, then release {console_bind|RightBottom} to open the level up screen. Each level gained offers your characters new progression options, which include new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} improvements, and other enhancements. Your companions gain new levels at the same time as your character. Even if they are not included in the active party during your journeys, you can always increase their level later.

traits.locale_text: 自分のキャラクターや仲間のレベルを上げることができる！戦闘に勝利し、コロヌス・エクスパンスを探索し、クエストを完了すると{g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}経験値{/g}を獲得できる。経験値が十分貯まると、キャラクターは新たなレベルに到達する。{console_bind|RightBottom}を押したまま{g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}レベルアップ{/g}アイコンを選択し、{console_bind|RightBottom}を離すとレベルアップ画面が開く。 レベルが上がるごとに、新しい{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}能力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}の向上、その他の強化など、キャラクターの新しい成長オプションが提供される。 仲間は、あなたのキャラクターと同時に新しいレベルに到達する。旅の間、活動中のグループに加わっていなかったとしても、後でいつでもレベルを上げることができる。

languages.text: 您可以为您的角色与您所有的同伴进行升级。您可以通过战胜敌人、探索{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}、完成任务来获得{g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}经验{/g}。当您的角色积累了足够的经验之后，等级就会提升。按住{console_bind|RightBottom}，选择{g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}升级{/g}图标，之后松开{console_bind|RightBottom}，即可打开升级界面。 每当您的角色升级时，都可以获得新的升级选项，包括新的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}强化，以及其他强化内容。 当您的角色升级时，您的同伴也同样会升级。即便这些同伴并不在您当前的队伍之中，您也可以后续提升他们的等级。
languages.original_text: You can advance the level of your character and their companions! Prevailing in battles, exploring the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, and completing quests earns you {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}experience points{/g}. Once you have accumulated enough experience, your character gains a new level. Hold {console_bind|RightBottom}, select the {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}level up{/g} icon, then release {console_bind|RightBottom} to open the level up screen. Each level gained offers your characters new progression options, which include new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} improvements, and other enhancements. Your companions gain new levels at the same time as your character. Even if they are not included in the active party during your journeys, you can always increase their level later.

traits.locale_text: 您可以为您的角色与您所有的同伴进行升级。您可以通过战胜敌人、探索{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}、完成任务来获得{g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}经验{/g}。当您的角色积累了足够的经验之后，等级就会提升。按住{console_bind|RightBottom}，选择{g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}升级{/g}图标，之后松开{console_bind|RightBottom}，即可打开升级界面。 每当您的角色升级时，都可以获得新的升级选项，包括新的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}强化，以及其他强化内容。 当您的角色升级时，您的同伴也同样会升级。即便这些同伴并不在您当前的队伍之中，您也可以后续提升他们的等级。

languages.text: Du kannst die Stufe deines Charakters und seiner Gefährten erhöhen. Der Gewinn von Kämpfen, die Erkundung der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} und der Abschluss von Quests gewährt dir {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}Erfahrungspunkte{/g}. Hast du genügend Erfahrung gesammelt, steigt dein Charakter in eine neue Stufe auf. Halte {console_bind|RightBottom}, wähle das {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}Aufsteigen{/g}-Symbol und lasse {console_bind|RightBottom} los, um den Aufsteigen-Bildschirm zu öffnen. Jede neue Stufe gewährt deinem Charakter neue Fortschrittsoptionen wie neue {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talente{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fähigkeitsverbesserungen{/g} und andere Aufwertungen. Deine Gefährten steigen zeitgleich mit deinem Charakter auf. Gehören sie nicht deiner aktiven Gruppe an, kannst du ihre Stufe zu einem späteren Zeitpunkt erhöhen.
languages.original_text: You can advance the level of your character and their companions! Prevailing in battles, exploring the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, and completing quests earns you {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}experience points{/g}. Once you have accumulated enough experience, your character gains a new level. Hold {console_bind|RightBottom}, select the {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}level up{/g} icon, then release {console_bind|RightBottom} to open the level up screen. Each level gained offers your characters new progression options, which include new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} improvements, and other enhancements. Your companions gain new levels at the same time as your character. Even if they are not included in the active party during your journeys, you can always increase their level later.

traits.locale_text: Du kannst die Stufe deines Charakters und seiner Gefährten erhöhen! Wenn du in Kämpfen siegst, die Koronus-Ausdehnung erkundest und Quests abschließt, erhältst du {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}Erfahrungspunkte{/g}. Sobald du genug Erfahrung gesammelt hast, steigt dein Charakter eine Stufe auf. Halte {console_bind|RightBottom} gedrückt, wähle das Symbol {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}Stufenaufstieg{/g} und lass dann {console_bind|RightBottom} los, um den Stufenaufstieg-Bildschirm zu öffnen. Jeder Stufenaufstieg bietet deinen Charakteren neue Entwicklungsmöglichkeiten, darunter neue {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talente{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fähigkeitsverbesserungen{/g} und andere Verbesserungen. Deine Gefährten steigen zur gleichen Zeit wie dein Charakter auf. Auch wenn sie während deiner Reisen nicht in der aktiven Gruppe sind, kannst du ihre Stufe später immer noch erhöhen.

Du kannst die Stufe deines Charakters und seiner Gefährten erhöhen! Wenn du in Kämpfen siegst, die {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} erkundest und Quests abschließt, erhältst du {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}Erfahrungspunkte{/g}. Sobald du genug Erfahrung gesammelt hast, steigt dein Charakter eine Stufe auf. Halte {console_bind|RightBottom} gedrückt, wähle das Symbol {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}Stufenaufstieg{/g} und lass dann {console_bind|RightBottom} los, um den Stufenaufstieg-Bildschirm zu öffnen. Jeder Stufenaufstieg bietet deinen Charakteren neue Entwicklungsmöglichkeiten, darunter neue {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talente{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeitsverbesserungen{/g} und andere Verbesserungen. Deine Gefährten steigen zur gleichen Zeit wie dein Charakter auf. Auch wenn sie während deiner Reisen nicht in der aktiven Gruppe sind, kannst du ihre Stufe später immer noch erhöhen.

languages.text: Vous pouvez améliorer le niveau de votre personnage et de ses compagnons ! Remportez des combats, explorez les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} et accomplissez des quêtes pour gagner des {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}points d'expérience{/g}. Après avoir accumulé suffisamment d'expérience, votre personnage gagne un nouveau niveau. Appuyez longuement sur {console_bind|RightBottom}, sélectionnez l'icône {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}Niveau supérieur{/g}, puis relâchez {console_bind|RightBottom} pour ouvrir l'écran de niveau supérieur. Chaque niveau gagné offre à vos personnages de nouvelles options de progression, dont des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}, améliorations de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétences{/g} et autres. Vos compagnons gagnent des niveaux en même temps que votre personnage. S'ils ne font pas partie du groupe actif lors de vos voyages, vous pouvez toujours augmenter leur niveau ultérieurement.
languages.original_text: You can advance the level of your character and their companions! Prevailing in battles, exploring the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, and completing quests earns you {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}experience points{/g}. Once you have accumulated enough experience, your character gains a new level. Hold {console_bind|RightBottom}, select the {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}level up{/g} icon, then release {console_bind|RightBottom} to open the level up screen. Each level gained offers your characters new progression options, which include new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} improvements, and other enhancements. Your companions gain new levels at the same time as your character. Even if they are not included in the active party during your journeys, you can always increase their level later.

traits.locale_text: Vous pouvez améliorer le niveau de votre personnage et de ses compagnons ! Remportez des combats, explorez les Étendues de Koronus et accomplissez des quêtes pour gagner des {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}points d’expérience{/g}. Après avoir accumulé suffisamment d'expérience, votre personnage gagne un nouveau niveau. Appuyez longuement sur {console_bind|RightBottom}, sélectionnez l'icône {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}Niveau supérieur{/g}, puis relâchez {console_bind|RightBottom} pour ouvrir l'écran de niveau supérieur. Chaque niveau gagné offre à vos personnages de nouvelles options de progression, incluant des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}, améliorations de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétences{/g} et autres. Vos compagnons gagnent des niveaux en même temps que votre personnage. S'ils ne font pas partie du groupe actif lors de vos voyages, vous pouvez toujours augmenter leur niveau ultérieurement.

Vous pouvez améliorer le niveau de votre personnage et de ses compagnons ! Remportez des combats, explorez les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} et accomplissez des quêtes pour gagner des {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}points d'expérience{/g}. Après avoir accumulé suffisamment d'expérience, votre personnage gagne un nouveau niveau. Appuyez longuement sur {console_bind|RightBottom}, sélectionnez l'icône {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}Niveau supérieur{/g}, puis relâchez {console_bind|RightBottom} pour ouvrir l'écran de niveau supérieur. Chaque niveau gagné offre à vos personnages de nouvelles options de progression, incluant des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}, améliorations de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétences{/g} et autres. Vos compagnons gagnent des niveaux en même temps que votre personnage. S'ils ne font pas partie du groupe actif lors de vos voyages, vous pouvez toujours augmenter leur niveau ultérieurement.

languages.text: Karakterinin ve yoldaşlarının seviyelerini yükseltebilirsin! Çatışmalardan galip çıkmak, {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'ni{/g} keşfetmek ve görevleri tamamlamak sana {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}tecrübe puanı{/g} kazandırır. Yeterince tecrübe puanı topladığında, karakterin yeni bir seviye kazanır. Seviye atlama ekranını açmak için {console_bind|RightBottom} düğmesini basılı tutup {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}seviye atla{/g} simgesini seç ve {console_bind|RightBottom} düğmesini bırak. Kazanılan her seviye, karakterlerine yepyeni {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}beceriler{/g} ile {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}yetenek{/g} geliştirmeleri gibi yeni gelişim seçenekleri sunar. Yoldaşların ana karakterinle aynı anda seviye atlar. Maceraların sırasında aktif grupta yer almasalar bile, seviyelerini daha sonra dilediğin zaman artırabilirsin.
languages.original_text: You can advance the level of your character and their companions! Prevailing in battles, exploring the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, and completing quests earns you {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}experience points{/g}. Once you have accumulated enough experience, your character gains a new level. Hold {console_bind|RightBottom}, select the {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}level up{/g} icon, then release {console_bind|RightBottom} to open the level up screen. Each level gained offers your characters new progression options, which include new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} improvements, and other enhancements. Your companions gain new levels at the same time as your character. Even if they are not included in the active party during your journeys, you can always increase their level later.
